thread.title: Buses collide in Lincoln Tunnel, injuring at least 32

title: Buses collide in Lincoln Tunnel, injuring at least 32
text:
Fire officials say two buses have collided in the Lincoln Tunnel, and authorities say 32 people have been hurt, included seven with serious, but non-life-threatening injuries.
@cbenavidesT47 tweet
Officials say a NJ Transit bus rear-ended another at about 9:50 a.m. ET Friday in the tunnel's center tube and then drove into New York City and pulled over. The accident snarled morning rush hour traffic.
@AirCycle tweet
The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, which manages the tunnel, did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
The Lincoln Tunnel connects New York City with New Jersey and is a major transit artery.
Officials said the tunnel was open, with delays.
--CNBC's Chloe Aiello contributed to this report.
